types.html:
illico presto

  1. (colloquial, emphatic) pronto, right away
    • 1997, MC Solaar, “Illico presto”, in Paradisiaque:
      Tout est dit dans Umberto Eco / J’ai besoin de vrai love illico presto / vrai love, illico presto
      Everything is said in Umberto Eco / I need real love, right away / real love, right now
    • 2016, Gaël Faye, Petit Pays [Small Country]:
      Je suis passé sur le billard, on m'a recousu et je suis revenu ici illico presto.
      I went under the surgeon's knife, they sewed me back up and I came back here right away.

title: illico presto
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /i.li.ko pʁɛs.to/
